name: Snake Crash Block Play
description:
Snake Crash Block Play is a classic snake game in which you need to eat balls in order to make your snake bigger.This is not simple snake game, This is a hard snake game vs Block.
There are walls made of blocks wich are white blocking its path. If the ball hits the block it will be destroyed.


Game Features:
- Free to play
- Endless gameplay
- Simple swipe control
- Challenge your friends with the best highscore
